text: imi seongseoeseo malsseum-i gyesidoeeo neohuiga hananim-ui malsseum-eul deud goseo geugeos-eul bulsinhamyeo jolonghaneun ja iss-eossdeola geudeul-i daleun hwajelo dollilttaekkaji geudeulgwa hamkke haji mal la man-il neohuiga hamkke handamyeon geudeul gwa daleul ba eobsnola hananimkkeseoneun wiseonjadeulgwa bulsinjadeul-eul jiog-eulo buleusinila
